00020 template<class SegmentData>
00021 class TMultiPolyline: public CMultiPolylineBase
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef CPolyline BaseClass;
00025 
00026        TMultiPolyline();
00027 
00028        // reimplemented (i2d::CMultiPolylineBase)
00029        virtual void SetParallelsCount(int count);
00030        virtual int GetParallelsCount() const;
00031        virtual void SetParallel(int segmentIndex, int parallelIndex, double width);
00032        virtual double GetParallel(int segmentIndex, int parallelIndex) const;
00033        virtual double GetMaxParallel() const;
00034        virtual double GetMinParallel() const;
00035        virtual void SetSegmentData(int segmentIndex, const SegmentData& data);
00036        virtual const iser::ISerializable& GetSegmentData(int segmentIndex) const;
00037        virtual bool RemoveSegment(int node, int segment);
00038        virtual void SelectAllSegments(bool selected = true);
00039        virtual void SelectSegment(int segmentIndex, bool selected = true);
00040        virtual bool IsSegmentSelected(int segmentIndex) const;
00041 
00042        // reimplemented (i2d::CPolygon)
00043        virtual bool InsertNode(const i2d::CVector2d& node);
00044        virtual bool InsertNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node);
00045        virtual void Clear();
00046 
00047        // reimplemented (i2d::CPolyline)
00048        virtual void SetClosed(bool state = true);
00049 
00050        // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00051        virtual bool Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive);
00052 
00053 protected:
00054        class CSegment
00055        {
00056        public:
00057               bool Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive){
00058                      bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(segmentTag);
00059                      m_data.Serialize(archive);
00060 
00061                      for (int i = 0; i < int(m_widthList.size()); i++){
00062                             retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_widthList[i]);
00063                      }
00064 
00065                      if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00066                             m_selected = false;
00067                      }
00068 
00069                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(segmentTag);
00070 
00071                      return retVal;
00072               }
00073 
00074               CSegment operator + (const CSegment& x) const
00075               {
00076                      CSegment result(*this);
00077                      I_ASSERT(result.m_widthList.size() == x.m_widthList.size());
00078 
00079                      for (int i = 0 ; i < int(result.m_widthList.size()); i++){
00080                             result.m_widthList[i] += x.m_widthList[i];
00081                      }
00082        //                   result.m_data += x.m_data;
00083 
00084                      return result;
00085               }
00086               CSegment operator /(double x) const
00087               {
00088                      CSegment result(*this);
00089 
00090                      result /= x;
00091                      return result;
00092               }
00093               CSegment& operator /=(double x)
00094               {
00095                      for (int i = 0 ; i < int(this->m_widthList.size()); i++){
00096                             this->m_widthList[i] /= x;
00097                      }
00098        //                   this->m_data /= x;
00099                      return *this;
00100               }
00101        };
00102 
00103        CSegment CalculateAverage(const CSegment& first, const CSegment& second) const;
00104 
00105        public:
00106               ::std::vector<double> m_widthList;
00107               bool m_selected;
00108               SegmentData m_data;
00109 
00110 private:
00111        ::std::vector<CSegment> m_segmentList;
00112 };

00122 template<class SegmentData>
00123 inline typename TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::CSegment TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::CalculateAverage(const CSegment& first, const CSegment& second) const
00124 {
00125        return (first + second) / 2.0;
00126 }

00129 template<class SegmentData>
00130 inline void TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::SetClosed(bool state)
00131 {
00132        if (IsClosed() == state){
00133               return;
00134        }
00135 
00136        if (state){
00137               CSegment segment = (m_segmentList.front() + m_segmentList.back()) / 2.0;
00138               segment.m_selected = true;
00139               m_segmentList.push_back(segment);
00140        }
00141        else{
00142               m_segmentList.pop_back();
00143        }
00144 
00145        BaseClass::SetClosed(state);
00146 }

00149 template<class SegmentData>
00150 inline bool TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::InsertNode(const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00151 {
00152        int nodesCount = GetNodesCount();
00153        if (nodesCount >= 1){
00154               if (nodesCount == 1){
00155                      CSegment segment;
00156                      segment.m_selected = true;
00157                      m_segmentList.push_back(segment);
00158                      if (IsClosed()){
00159                             m_segmentList.push_back(segment);
00160                      }
00161               }
00162               else{
00163                      m_segmentList.push_back(m_segmentList.back());
00164                      m_segmentList.back().m_selected = true;
00165               }
00166 
00167        }
00168 
00169        return BaseClass::InsertNode(node);
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 template<class SegmentData>
00174 inline bool TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::InsertNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00175 {
00176        int nodesCount = GetNodesCount();
00177        if (nodesCount >= 1){
00178               CSegment emptySegment;
00179               emptySegment.m_selected = true;
00180               if (nodesCount == 1){
00181                      m_segmentList.push_back(emptySegment);
00182                      if (IsClosed()){
00183                             m_segmentList.push_back(emptySegment);
00184                      }
00185               }
00186               else{
00187                      CSegment& segmentRef = emptySegment;
00188                      if (index == 0){
00189                             if (IsClosed()){
00190                                    segmentRef = m_segmentList.back();
00191                             }
00192                             else{
00193                                    segmentRef = m_segmentList.front();
00194                             }
00195                      }
00196                      else{
00197                             if (index >= nodesCount){
00198                                    segmentRef = m_segmentList.back();
00199                             }
00200                             else{
00201                                    segmentRef = m_segmentList[index - 1];
00202                             }
00203                      }
00204 
00205                      ::std::vector<CSegment>::iterator iter = m_segmentList.begin();
00206                      iter += index;
00207 
00208                      ::std::vector<CSegment>::iterator curr = m_segmentList.insert(iter, segmentRef);
00209                      (*curr).m_selected = true;
00210               }
00211        }
00212 
00213        return BaseClass::InsertNode(index, node);
00214 }

00218 inline void TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::Clear()
00219 {
00220        m_segmentList.clear();
00221        BaseClass::Clear();
00222 }

00225 template<class SegmentData>
00226 inline bool TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::RemoveSegment(int node, int segment)
00227 {
00228        I_ASSERT(node >= 0);
00229        I_ASSERT(segment >= 0 && segment < int(m_segmentList.size()));
00230 
00231        node %= GetNodesCount();
00232        ::std::vector<CSegment>::iterator iter = m_segmentList.begin();
00233        iter += segment;
00234        m_segmentList.erase(iter);
00235 
00236        return RemoveNode(node);
00237 }

00240 template<class SegmentData>
00241 void TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::SetParallelsCount(int count)
00242 {
00243        I_ASSERT(count > 0);
00244 
00245        for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < int(m_segmentList.size()); segmentIndex++){
00246               m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList.resize(count);
00247        }
00248 }
00249

00251 
00252 template<class SegmentData>
00253 int TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::GetParallelsCount() const
00254 {
00255        if (m_segmentList.size() == 0)
00256               return 0;
00257 
00258        return m_segmentList[0].m_widthList.size();
00259 }

00262 template<class SegmentData>
00263 void TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::SetParallel(int segmentIndex, int parallelIndex, double width)
00264 {
00265        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex >= 0 && segmentIndex < int(m_segmentList.size()));
00266        I_ASSERT(parallelIndex >= 0 && parallelIndex < GetParallelsCount());
00267 
00268        m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList[parallelIndex] = width;
00269 }

00272 template<class SegmentData>
00273 double TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::GetParallel(int segmentIndex, int parallelIndex) const
00274 {
00275        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex >= 0 && segmentIndex < int(m_segmentList.size()));
00276        I_ASSERT(parallelIndex >= 0 && parallelIndex < GetParallelsCount());
00277 
00278        return m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList[parallelIndex];

00286

00327 template<class SegmentData>
00328 double TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::GetMaxParallel() const
00329 {
00330        double maxValue = -_qel_HUGE_NUMBER;
00331 
00332        if (GetParallelsCount() > 0){
00333               ::std::vector<double>::const_iterator max_it;
00334 
00335               for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < int(m_segmentList.size()); segmentIndex++){
00336                      max_it = ::std::max_element(m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList.begin(),
00337                                                                       m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList.end());
00338                      if (maxValue < *max_it){
00339                             maxValue = *max_it;
00340                      }
00341               }
00342        }
00343 
00344        return maxValue;
00345 }
00346 
00347 
00348 template<class SegmentData>
00349 double TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::GetMinParallel() const
00350 {
00351        double minValue = _qel_HUGE_NUMBER;
00352 
00353        if (GetParallelsCount() > 0){
00354               ::std::vector<double>::const_iterator min_it;
00355 
00356               for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < int(m_segmentList.size()); segmentIndex++){
00357                      min_it = ::std::min_element(m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList.begin(),
00358                                                                       m_segmentList[segmentIndex].m_widthList.end());
00359                      if (minValue > *min_it){
00360                             minValue = *min_it;
00361                      }
00362               }
00363        }
00364 
00365        return minValue;
00366 }

00369 template<class SegmentData>
00370 bool TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00371 {
00372        int segmentCount = m_segmentList.size();
00373        int parallelCount = GetParallelsCount();
00374 
00375        bool retVal = true;
00376 
00377        retVal = retVal && CPolyline::Serialize(archive);
00378 
00379        static iser::CArchiveTag multiPolylineTag("MultiPolyline", "MultiPolyline");
00380        static iser::CArchiveTag segmentTag("Segment", "Segment");
00381        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(multiPolylineTag, segmentTag, segmentCount);
00382        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(parallelCount);
00383 
00384        if (!archive.IsStoring() && retVal){
00385               m_segmentList.resize(segmentCount);
00386               SetParallelsCount(parallelCount);
00387        }
00388 
00389        for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < segmentCount; ++segmentIndex){
00390               retVal = retVal && m_segmentList[segmentIndex].Serialize(archive);
00391        }
00392        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(multiPolylineTag);
00393 
00394        return retVal;
00395 }
